short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to disable view access to YouTube Shorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Disable YouTube Shorts" is a simple yet effective Chrome extension that hides YouTube Shorts from your browsing experience on YouTube. With just one click, you can keep your YouTube experience free of Shorts, allowing you to focus on the content you love.
